welcomeMessageContents: Welcome to Hysummit Community Support! React with the appropriate emoji to create a support ticket to meet your needs.

support.title: support-ticket-%username%
support.messageBody: Support ticket created! Someone from our staff will be right with you. Feel free to mention any relevant details that we'll need to know to help you.

appeals.title: appeal-ticket-%username%
appeals.messageBody: Ban Appeal ticket created! Someone from our staff will be right with you. Feel free to mention any relevant details that we'll need to know to help you.
